column2: For too long the Shogunate has overshadowed your power, it's time to free yourself of those shackles.
We have recieved a letter from the emperor demanding that we destroy the shogunate immediately, that he is once again in ascension.
The Shogun has refused your demands, will you strike out against him?
The CB to destroy the shogun is now available
The Emperor must asser his dominion over Japan
Having ascended to the Chrysanthemum Throne it is now your choice as emperor if you will bless your people.
I bless those who dwell near castles.
I bless those who dwell in the cities.
I bless those who dwell near temples.
At the Coronation of the new emperor he has decided to bless those who dwell near Castles.
At the Coronation of the new emperor he has decided to bless those who dwell in Cities.
At the Coronation of the new emperor he has decided to bless those who dwell near Temples.
At the Coronation of the new emperor he has decided to bless no one...
You are reaching the end of your studies and its time to decide which area you will specialise into.
I will specialise in Communist Law.
I will specialise in Republican Law.
I will specialise in Imperial Law.
Late night studying has left you feeling somewhat unwell, however a small amount of herbal remedy could prevent it before it gets worse.
I will happily purchase the remedy.
A Scholar has arrived at the library you have chosen to study law in and has offered to tutor you for a small fee.
I shall take him up on his offer.
You have noticed a rare book in the library you have chosen to study the law in, it would be incredibly easy to steal it.
I doubt the librarian will miss this.
The Councillor will travel the province actively proclaiming and enforcing the code of law.
